name: Armfinding
description:
Welcome to the world of Shape's Land. In this world you have the ability to morph into any figure.  This is still a Demo and you can morph only into a ball. if you want a full version let us know.It's a coop game but you can play it also alone.

with the arrow you can move the green character

with WASD you can move the red character

P = pause 

R= restar the level

This game was made in only 4 days for the GeoGame jam. The theme was Switch. We chose SWITCH Figure to fit the theme.
